description: Stretch one arm with hand palm facing forward and pull your fingers back for 10 seconds per hand.
Stretch your arm against your chest and pull it using your other arm for 10 seconds per arm.
Pull your neck to the right from the top of your head for 10 seconds, and then pull it to the left.
With both hands behind your back, move it down, while stretching the back of your head for 10 seconds.
Cross your legs and try to reach the floor with your hands for 10 seconds. Switch legs and do it again.
While sitting, spread your legs and try to touch the floor with the palm of your hands; do it 3 times, for 5 seconds.
Pull one knee against your chest and hold it for 10 seconds; repeat for the other knee.
While sitting, cross one leg and lean your chest forward; switch legs after 10 seconds.
While sitting, close your eyes and cover them with your hands for 2 minutes, and then open your eyes.
In an open environment, look as far away as possible in all four directions for 3 seconds, moving only your eyes. Repeat 3 times.
Using your thumbs, massage the area below your eyebrows in circles for 15 seconds.
Stand up, twist your waist as much as possible to the left for 5 seconds. Repeat to the right.
